font.bgcolor: EMPLOYMENT OPPORTUNITIES FOR 2020-2021 ACADEMIC YEAR --- K-5 ELEMENTARY TEACHER, SPEECH-PATHOLOGIST, & ASSISTANT KITCHEN STAFF (OPEN THROUGH MAY 9)

h3.a: NOW HIRING FOR K-5 ELEMENTARY TECHER, SPEECH-LANGUAGE PATHOLOGIST, AND ASSISTANT KITCHEN STAFF

div.p: The Nell Holcomb R-IV School District (K-8) is seeking an elementary (K-5) classroom teacher for the 2020-2021 academic year. Applicants must have a valid Early Childhood Education or Elementary Education degree. This position will require the skills for developing and delivering high-quality, standards-based lessons in collaboration with other teachers and professional staff. The teacher must have knowledge of and be able to utilize . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about NOW HIRING FOR K-5 ELEMENTARY TECHER, SPEECH-LANGUAGE PATHOLOGIST, AND ASSISTANT KITCHEN STAFF

div.p: A post from our favorite librarian, Mrs. Nelson: Hope all is well! I wanted to let you know that we have a new online resource that could be really helpful for you as you're working to engage your children at home. It's a company called "Lightbox" that makes K-12 multimedia curriculum-based ebooks available at no cost and it's available until August 1! Each Lightbox ebook contains videos, activities, quizzes, links . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about New Resource for ebooks!

div.p:
On April 7th, Nell Holcomb Voters will have the opportunity to vote on Proposition Hawks. Proposition Hawks is a plan that benefits every present and future Nell Holcomb student. Please take the time to watch this short video and please take the time to vote on April 7th!
Nell_Holcomb_Proposition_Hawks_Video

a.aria-label: Read more about Nell Holcomb Proposition Hawks Video
Read more about FEBRUARY 2020 NHS NEWSPAPER Vol. 20 Issue 3
Read more about INTRODUCTION TO PROPOSITION HAWKS

div.p: NHS students and staff will have the opportunity to paint on a portion of the Missouri Bicentennial Mural on Tuesday, January 28th. This mural will be hung in the capital in Jefferson City during the Missouri Bicentennial Celebration in 2021 and will be in the Guinness Book of World Records for so many participants! Students will have the opportunity to purchase a commemorative button for $2 as well. . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about MO BICENTENNIAL MURAL

div.p: Remember that you can purchase gift cards for travel and accommodations, groceries, gas, GIFTS. If 20 families participated with using $1630 per month on expenses they are already purchasing, the amount of potential money brought into NHS PTO would be over $20,000. WOW!!

a.aria-label: Read more about POTENTIAL EARNINGS & BENEFITS

div.p:
Scrip is simply a word that means “substitute money” – in other words, scrip is gift certificates from national and local retailers. They’re the same gift certificates that you buy at the store. Over 750 retailers participate in this program.
You’re probably asking yourself how these stores help us raise money. It’s simple -- scrip participating retailers . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about WHAT IS A SCRIP?
